attributes.action: reimbust  any one travelling to benefit offices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
with the closures of job benefit centres people are being asked to travel more tha 50 miles to and from job centres . and pay the cost out of their benefit .
 my son has to travel 56 miles to and from the nearest benefit office which is in dumfries and has to pay the bus fare out of his benefit which is so unfair on all who have to travel to sign on or go for interveiws etc this is not acceptable . what people on benefit get is what the law says they need to live on not to pay travel expenses to sign on etc
